event_name: 2016 Championship Game of the WSA Future's Cup

players_involved.name: Hannah Landrum
players_involved.action: cool control and dribbling, finds Langley out wide

players_involved.name: Langley
players_involved.action: receives in space, drives down the wing and delivers a cross

players_involved.name: Caroline
players_involved.action: makes a run into the box

players_involved.name: Claire Briggs
players_involved.action: makes a run into the box

narrative: Quick throw-in from {Corrie Green} finds {Hannah Landrum} — cool control, slick dribbling, and a sharp pass out wide to {Langley} in space on the wing. {Langley} drives and whips in a cross looking for {Caroline} or {Claire Briggs} in the box — just couldn't quite get her foot all the way around it!
caption_hook: Find the wing. Attack the box. That's the game plan.
